schema_version.hidden comment: Bump the default in the subclasses.

organism.comment: Do not submit, value is assigned by the object.
organism.title: Organism

internal_tags.description: Some donors are part of particular data collections
internal_tags.title: Internal tags

url.description: An external resource with additional information about the donor.
url.title: URL

description: Schema for submitting a human donor.
title: Human donor

___parents.description: Donor IDs of biological parents, if known.
___parents.title: Parents

items.description: A donor ID of a biological parent, if known.
items.comment: For human biosamples, see human_donor.json for available identifiers. For mouse biosamples, see mouse_donor.json for available identifiers.
items.title: Parent

___age.description: The age or age range of the donor when biological material was sampled.
___age.title: Donor age

___siblings.description: Donors that have at least one parent in common.
___siblings.title: Siblings

items.description: A donors that has at least one parent in common.
items.comment: For human biosamples, see human_donor.json for available identifiers. For mouse biosamples, see mouse_donor.json for available identifiers.
items.title: Sibling

items.description: A unique identifier from external resource.
items.title: External identifier

___identical_twin.description: A donor that have identical genetic material.
___identical_twin.comment: For human biosamples, see human_donor.json for available identifiers. For mouse biosamples, see mouse_donor.json for available identifiers.
___identical_twin.title: Identical twin

___children.XXXnote: Can be removed since we have parents.
___children.description: Donors that genetic material was supplied to.
___children.title: Children

items.description: A donor that genetic material was supplied to.
items.comment: For human biosamples, see human_donor.json for available identifiers. For mouse biosamples, see mouse_donor.json for available identifiers.
items.title: Child

___fraternal_twin.comment: For human biosamples, see human_donor.json for available identifiers. For mouse biosamples, see mouse_donor.json for available identifiers.
___fraternal_twin.title: Fraternal twin
